author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Vista builds on BMW partnership
text:
Vista builds on BMW partnership Vista builds on BMW partnership Details Category: Agency & Association Created on Thursday, 20 August 2015 09:30 Leading creative communications agency, Vista, delivered four back-to-back conferences and gala dinners in a major strategic week for automotive giant BMW Group UK. The events included BMW Group UK Retailer Conference, the MINI UK Sales Conference, the BMW Group UK Aftersales Conference, and the BMW Group UK Sales and Marketing Conference. 
James Wilkins, Managing Director said: “This is absolutely what we’re designed for. It combined all the best bits about Vista.” The Leeds and London-based agency (formerly Logistik Group) has developed a strong partnership with the internationally respected brand, after delivering both their Aftersales and Dealer Budget conferences last year. In addition to Vista executing all planning, logistics, production and AV for the flagship week at Liverpool’s Echo Arena, the company also took the lead on creative conception. Working closely with the brand’s internal stakeholders, Vista’s in-house teams produced tailored content, film and digital support, showcasing their impressive full service offering. Mr Wilkins said: “We think of ourselves as trusted partners rather than an employed agency. This means we put ourselves into colleagues’ shoes, so we really understand their mindsets and ambitions – and then help translate this into real results.” Related articles
